DOC.brief_summary: Examination of the correlation between the cerebral bloodflow and the clinical change under treatment with Reminyl retard® and the prediction of clinical change by measuring the cerebral bloodflow in patients with mild to moderate Alzheimer's Disease
DOC.brief_title: Continuous Arterial Spin Labeling (CASL) MRI for Monitoring and Prediction of Drug Therapy in Alzheimers Disease (AD)
